Text: PulteGroup Inc., up 55 cents to $35.46  Shares in homebuilders rose after the National Association of Realtors reported U.S. home sales rose 1.3% in August.
Cause: the National Association of Realtors reported U.S. home sales rose 1.3% in August.
Effect: PulteGroup Inc., up 55 cents to $35.46  Shares in homebuilders rose
Sentence: <e2>PulteGroup Inc., up 55 cents to $35.46  Shares in homebuilders rose</e2> after <e1>the National Association of Realtors reported U.S. home sales rose 1.3% in August.</e1>
